original_text: Let the wilderness and the cities thereof lift up their voice, the villages that Kedar doth inhabit: let the inhabitants of the rock sing, let them shout from the top of the mountains.
korean_text: 광야와 거기에 있는 성읍들과 게달 사람이 사는 마을들은 소리를 높이라 셀라의 주민들은 노래하며 산 꼭대기에서 즐거이 부르라

sentences.original_text: Let the wilderness lift up their voice
and the cities thereof lift up their voice
the villages that Kedar doth inhabit
let the inhabitants of the rock sing
let them shout from the top of the mountains
